EmailTemplate.name: Trades Requests
EmailTemplate.subject: DSPS Response to Inquiry
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{!Today}
Dear {!MUSW__License2__c.Applicant_Full_Name__c},
Replacement cards Replacement cards cost $15.00 each. Please fill out and return this form – https://dsps.wi.gov/Credentialing/Trades/fm3168.pdf Submit paperwork/payment Please make payment via the eSLA portal at https://eSLA.wi.gov. You can access your cart by clicking on the cart icon in the upper right corner of the screen.
For alternate payments options, mail payment into the Milwaukee PO Box, email/fax in with a credit card payment form (https://dsps.wi.gov/Credentialing/General/fm3073.pdf), or bring into the Madison address during business hours (immediate service). Verifications To request a Wisconsin credential status verification, please print, fill out and return this form - https://dsps.wi.gov/Credentialing/Trades/fm3176.pdf Processing time Wisconsin Administrative Code provides us with 21 days from the time the check is cashed to process the application and return the credential or a request for additional information to you. Once your items are reviewed, you will receive notification via mail from the Department. Lists You may purchase a list of credential holders online - https://app.wi.gov/DSPSLicenseList Lists do not include phone numbers, and may not include email addresses. Note: If a credential holder opts out from the list, the list will only contain their name, city, and state. Complaints If you would like to file a complaint about a person in the Trades, you can do that online or print out a form to submit - https://dsps.wi.gov/pages/SelfService/FileAComplaint.aspx If you have questions about the status of a complaint you have already filed, you can contact Joe Kaether at 608-266-2112. Payment – credit card Please make payment via the eSLA portal at www.eSLA.wi.gov. You can access your cart by clicking on the cart icon in the upper right corner of the screen.
For your convenience, included is a link to our credit card payment form: https://dsps.wi.gov/Credentialing/General/fm3073.pdf You may fax the form using our secure line: (608) 267-0592, or send by email.
Thank you, The Wisconsin Department of Safety and Professional Services
